Haste
When Greenwood Outrider enters, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of storied permanents you control. [i](Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)[/i]
notes:
!Storied
fluffy: swapped order (vigorspore wurm), +gain, some mainframing
